summary: This is a small modification to the default ebony cuirass that changes the pauldrons into a different shaped ones.
descriptionHtml:
Hello again!

This is a small modification to the default ebony cuirass that changes the pauldrons into a different shaped ones. I also made a small modification to the neck piece. This mod comes in two variations, a replacer and a craftable one. The craftable one is indentical to the vanilla ebony armor except for the model.

This mod does not require or include any *NEW* textures. If you are using a texture replacer like aMidianBorn Ebony ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37487/? ), it will use those textures.

Also, I recommend downloading a some type of helmet replacer, like: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4131/? as the vanilla helmet for ebony armor is a bit misshaped.

Feel free to leave comments and suggestions. :)

Thank you!

NEW!

Added into the optional downloads a replacer file for the ebony shield model. This version replaces the default shield with a slightly bigger one so it no longer appears like a buckler.
author: lautasantenni

files.name: Ebony Armor Type Two
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a tiny issue with the pauldrons that made them slighty stretch on some animations.

files.changelogHtml:
Removed the front ornaments from the pauldrons on user request
Moved the old version under optional downloads
Lowered the pauldrons of the new version on the female model
